title: d4v41: "We weren't synchronized enough to stop their retakes"
description: VLR interviewed Paper Rex's Khalish "d4v41" Rusyaidee following the Paper Rex vs G2 Esports matchup in the Group D opening match of Valorant Champions Seoul.
author: Seulgi

title: alecks addresses mistakes made against G2 in press conference
description: A disappointing 0-2 loss for Paper Rex kicked off day four of Champions.
author: Seulgi

title: G2 Esports walk over Paper Rex with 2-0 win
description: The sole Ascension team at Champions have defeated last year's finalists to advance in the group stage.
author: thothgow

title: Gorilla: "Trace aren't underdogs at all here"
description: VLR interviewed Team Vitality's Harry "Gorilla" Mepham following the Team Vitality vs. Trace Esports matchup in the Group C opening match of Valorant Champions Seoul.
author: Seulgi

title: Sayf keeps Vitality's spirits held high in press conference despite loss
author: Seulgi

title: Trace put China on the board at Champions
description: Trace took down Vitality 2-1 in the group stage.
author: FerahgoTheGreat

title: FrosT: "The biggest reason we lost is because we were too nervous"
description: VLR interviewed Talon Esports' Hector "FrosT" Rosario following the Leviatán vs. Talon Esports matchup in the Group C opening match of Valorant Champions Seoul.
author: Seulgi

title: Talon's FrosT hammers in on critical errors made against Leviatán in team press conference
author: Seulgi

title: Leviatán defeat Talon Esports 2-0 to begin their Champions 2024 campaign
description: Leviatán find success despite a solid showing from Talon's primmie.
author: jenopelle

title: RRQ announces Lmemore as a Restricted Free Agent
description: RRQ is already making changes for 2025.
author: TheSacredDonut

title: Boaster admits standing flaws against Bilibili during FNATIC press conference
description: In Boaster's mind, FNATIC still has multiple things that they could improve on. The name of the game for them? Having fun.
author: Seulgi

title: nephh laments on team's chance to win in Bilibili's press conference
description: Bilibili's opening game against FNATIC didn't go to the team's expectations, falling short in a swift 0-2 defeat.
author: Seulgi

title: Fnatic sweep Bilibili Gaming in Champions 2024 group stage
description: Fnatic swept Bilibili Gaming 2-0 in Group A of the Champions 2024 group stage.
author: weivy

title: BuZz reflects on recovering against KRÜ in press conference
description: Even with a bad start, DRX had some key takeaways that brought the Korean side back to life.
author: Seulgi

title: KRÜ's Atom opens up on loss to DRX in press conference
description: A 13-2 start on Haven didn't exactly play out in KRU's favor as the match progressed.
author: Seulgi

title: DRX win three-map roller coaster against KRÜ Esports
description: A back-and-forth match across three maps before DRX finally end up on top.
author: jenopelle

title: Heretics eke out 2-1 over FPX in Group B opener
description: A first step in a seemingly very tough group.
author: eutalyx

title: Sacy: "I felt like changing wasn't necessary"
description: VLR interviewed Sentinels' Gustavo "Sacy" Rossi following the Gen.G vs. Sentinels matchup in the Group B opening match of Valorant Champions Seoul.

title: Gen.G open Champions Seoul with dominant victory over Sentinels

title: Pacific Challenger Leagues all set for Ascension Tokyo
description: Fan-favorites Disguised, Full Sense, and more are ready to fight for a spot in VCT.

title: M80 lead NA, qualify for Ascension alongside TSM
description: M80 and TSM are the two NA teams going to Americas Ascension in 2024.

title: Klaus announces free agency, leaving KRÜ after three seasons
description: Klaus will be LFT for the first time in his VCT career.

title: Riot announce imminent map pool rotation, patch 9.02
description: Pearl and Split will return... eventually.

title: Red Bull Home Ground #5 arrives in November
description: Red Bull Home Ground continues it's annual international event.

title: Brazil and LATAM lock in teams for Americas Ascension
description: Brazil and Latin America are ready for contend for the ultimate prize in Challengers.

title: Sin Prisa Gaming, RIDDLE ORDER secure Pacific Ascension spots
description: Just a handful of wins away from VCT.

title: EMEA Challenger Leagues ready Ascension representatives
description: Just one more step until they're in the VCT.

title: Champions 2024 opening matches drawn
description: Less than two weeks remain before Champions Seoul kicks off.

title: Leviatán defeat G2, take Americas trophy
description: In the Stage 2 playoffs final, Leviatán took down favorite G2 esports to claim their first VCT Americas championship.
